I would like to contribute some code. The code example could be found here http://github.com/KnisterPeter/qooxdoo-formcontroller
With the binding.FormController2 it is possible to create a databinding setup where updates form the model will be passed to the view immediatelly while updated from the view will be passed to the model only on calling commit. Also the view can be reseted by using the reset method.
This controller is useful for the common master-detail pattern where a selection is displayed in a form but changes on the form should only be persisted when some save button is pressed.
I checked your code and it seems like a good addition. Can't use it out of the box but the idea is good and could make a good enhancement to the form controller in deed! Thank you very much.

It was quite a challenge to get all the possible permutations tested including converter, deep binding and selection handling widgets. Finally wrote a couple of unit tests and implemented the feature with r24050. Here is some code to test it in the playground: http://tinyurl.com/3yrbr2s
